title: Does the retailer sell tobacco products (including electronic smoking devices, but not including rolling papers)?
Is the retailer's tobacco license clearly displayed?
Are tobacco products easily accessible to minors i.e., within reach without help from market staff?
How many tobacco ads do you see next to the checkout area (attached or directly next to)?
How many tobacco ads do you see hanging from the ceiling (directly over the register)?
Is there tobacco advertising next to candy or toy displays?
How many tobacco ads do you see below the checkout area?
Is there tobacco advertising at a height of 4 feet or lower?
How many tobacco ads do you see on the floor near the checkout area?
